content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (16 ounce) package Cheddar cheese, shredded" )
( ing-4 "1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes" )

content.text: 1 (16 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cubed
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (16 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cubed" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "325 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "165 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.
2) Cut a slit in each jalapeno pepper.
3) Remove and discard seeds and pulp.
4) In a medium bowl, mix sausage, baking mix, Cheddar cheese, crushed red pepper, and garlic salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sausage"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking mix"@34:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "Cheddar cheese"@46:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "crushed red pepper"@62:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic salt"@86:97 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stuff jalapenos with the Monterey Jack cheese cubes.
6) Shape sausage mixture around the jalapenos to form balls.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Shape"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "sausage mixture"@9:24 / FOOD )
		:loc ( "the jalapenos"@32:45 / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-6-0 "to form balls"@46:59 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Arrange jalapeno balls on the prepared baking sheet.
8) Bake 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "the preheated oven"@22:40 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "25 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until lightly browned"@42:63 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
